content:
Based on the execution logs, I'll generate a new report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System at position(41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 41, -82) facing DOWN
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at position (42.5, -80.5) facing RIGHT
The system is operational with the drill working and chest collecting coal

### Iron Smelting Station at position(-15, -50)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (-15, -50)
Currently has some iron plates in output but no ingredients for smelting

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones at a location
- When placing transport belts, ensure the target location is clear of other entities

### Inventory Management Errors
- Check inventory contents before attempting to insert items
- Monitor furnace inventory capacity (50 items max) before attempting to add more fuel
- Ensure required materials are in inventory before attempting insertion operations

### Entity Removal Errors
- Verify entity existence at specified position before attempting removal
- Use correct entity type and position when trying to pick up entities

### System Design Issues
- Belt systems frequently get blocked and need clearing
- Inserters often end up waiting for space in destination
- Consider better space management and entity positioning to avoid blockages

NAMESPACE

Functions:
- `place_entity()`: Places game entities at specified positions
  - Failures: Placement location occupied
  - Success: When target location is clear
- `insert_item()`: Inserts items into entities
  - Failures: Full inventory, Missing source items
  - Success: When destination has space and source items exist
- `pickup_entity()`: Removes entities from the map
  - Failures: Entity not found at position
  - Success: When entity exists at target position

Important Variables:
- `furnace`: Represents furnace entity (type: Furnace)
- `belt3`: Transport belt entity (type: TransportBelt)
- `drill`: Mining drill entity (type: BurnerMiningDrill)
